data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 3, Savio Pereira Sampaio has awarded Palmeiras a corner.
Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Palmeiras's Ze Rafael misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 5, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 11, Marlon Freitas (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 20, Goal! Wesley gives Palmeiras a 0-1 lead.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Savio Pereira Sampaio has awarded Palmeiras a corner.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In the minute 28, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 31, Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Goianiense GO takes a corner from the left.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 34, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chico (Goianiense GO) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 38, Goianiense GO takes a corner from the left.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 41, Goianiense GO drives forward and Ze Roberto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Palmeiras are whistled for offside.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 42, Gabriel Baralhas of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Palmeiras's Rony is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO drive upfield and Chico gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Savio Pereira Sampaio has awarded Goianiense GO a corner.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Luan Garcia is booked for the away team.
The second-half has started.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 46, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 50, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 52, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Raphael Veiga (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Ze Roberto's header is off-target for Goianiense GO.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Goal! Luiz Adriano extends Palmeiras's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 58, Goianiense GO pushes forward through Janderson Santos de Souza, whose finish on goal is saved.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Janderson Santos de Souza (Goianiense GO) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 59, Natanael is replacing Nicolas Vichiatto for the home team.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 61, Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goianiense GO.
Matheus Vargas is on a sub for Gabriel Baralhas for Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO drive upfield and Chico gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 64, Luiz Adriano puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
That's a fine assist from Gabriel Menino.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Dudu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Wesley's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 67, The home team replace Gustavo Ferrareis with Junior Brandao.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO make their fourth substitution with Matheuzinho replacing Ze Roberto.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
In the minute 70, Goianiense GO push upfield and Marlon Freitas gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Palmeiras defence.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Gabriel Menino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Chico's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
Palmeiras make their first substitution with Willian replacing Luiz Adriano.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
In the minute 74, The away team replace Raphael Veiga with Lucas Lima.
In the minute 76, Palmeiras's Rony misses with an attempt on goal.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 77, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Palmeiras.
Arnaldo is replacing Dudu for the home team.
Chico (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Chico of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 81, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Wesley for Palmeiras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 82, Palmeiras's Wesley is back in action after a slight knock.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gustavo Scarpa is on a sub for Wesley for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras make their fourth substitution with Ramires replacing Patrick de Paula.
Rony (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 84, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 87, Natanael (Goianiense GO) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Matheus Vargas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 89, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gustavo Scarpa (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Matheuzinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Lucas Lima of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Gabriel Silva is replacing Rony for the away team.
